metadata.name: LIMONATA CHA CHA CHA
metadata.description:
Lemons are very characteristic of Capri.
They are much bigger than average and the tourist who sees them for the first time is often incredulous in front of these “big” fruits. 
You can smell lemons all over Capri and eat a Lemon Gelato or drink a very cold lemonade.


Artist: Bort_tv

Collection: CAPRI

Edition: 1/1
